column1: Once upon a time there were Three Bears who lived together in a house of their own in a wood. One of them was a Little
column3: Wee Bear; and one was a Middle-sized Bear
column4: and the other was a Great
column5: Huge Bear. They had each a pot for their porridge; a little pot for the Little
column7: Wee Bear; and a middle-sized pot for the Middle Bear; and a great pot for the Great
column8: Huge Bear. And they had each a chair to sit in; a little chair for the Little
column10: Wee Bear; and a middle-sized chair for the Middle Bear; and a great chair for the Great
column11: Huge Bear. And they had each a bed to sleep in; a little bed for the Little
column13: Wee Bear; and a middle-sized bed for the Middle Bear; and a great bed for the Great
